title: Create Dragon Radar loading screen
description:
Dragon Radar Loading Screen - COMPLETED

Created DragonRadarLoader.astro component with authentic DBZ radar aesthetic:
- 5-second full-screen loading animation with auto-hide
- Green circular radar screen (500px) with radial gradient background
- Rotating orange sweep arm with blur effect (2s rotation)
- Grid background with flickering animation
- Static/scanline overlay for retro CRT effect
- Orange triangle center marker using CSS border technique
- 7 orange/red gradient dots (NOT images) matching classic Dragon Radar
  - Positioned scattered across screen
  - Radial gradient from #ff6600 to #ff3300
  - Multiple box-shadows for glow effects
  - Staggered pulsing animations (1.5s cycle with 0.2s delays)
- Status text: 'SCANNING...' with 'DRAGON RADAR SYSTEM' subtitle
- Error message: 'ERROR - SIGNAL INTERFERENCE' with glitch animation
- Mobile responsive (90vmin on small screens)
- Integrated into anime.astro page

All animations slowed for better visual effect. Component uses CSS-only styling with no external images for dragon balls.
